name: How to Make Thai Red Curry Paste
description: This recipe for Thai red curry paste is made by pounding together a combination of aromatic Thai ingredients, resulting in a flavorful and authentic paste.

recipeInstructions.text: Soak dry red spur chilies in water for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak dry red spur chilies in water for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add dried chilies, lemongrass, galangal, and salt to the mortar and pound until they are completely broken down.
recipeInstructions.name: Add dried chilies, lemongrass, galangal, and salt to the mortar and pound until they are completely broken down.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the remaining ingredients (dry red spur chilies, kaffir lime zest, turmeric, shrimp paste, garlic, and shallots) and pound until you get a fine paste.
